snippet: Rafael Nadal rallied from a set down and fought off a match point in the third set to beat Alexander Zverev 6-7 (8), 6-0, 7-5 Wednesday and reach the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in pursuit of a fourth title....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal rallied from a set down and fought off a match point in the third set to beat Alexander Zverev 6-7 (8), 6-0, 7-5 Wednesday and reach the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in pursuit of a fourth title.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Holds Off Upstart Zverev in 3 Sets at Indian Wells
headline.main: Nadal Holds Off Upstart Zverev in 3 Sets at Indian Wells
